name: Herb & Penny
description:
Escape the lab, birds!

This is a co-op or single player adventure puzzle game where you must work together to get through the levels. Herb is a pigeon that can fly, while Penny is a flightless penguin - use their relationship dynamics to get ahead.

Gameplay

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move, figure out the puzzles by controlling the two players to make your way to the respective end door.

Team

Coding: Jesse Taylor

Visuals: Julia Singh  

Level Design:  Julian Ferrares 

Credits: Music & Sound Effects by Incompetech & FreeSound.org

Particle Effects by FullTiltBoogie
